description.p: Extract the day of the month from a date or datetime value.
Returns the day number from the date or datetime value.

discussion.p: The Day function extracts the day of the month from a date or datetime value

example.caption: Day() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentDateTime() AS Now, Day(CurrentDateTime()) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:48:35 00 pm|10
